Core Classes

  • greybox.ALM - Augmented Linear Model estimator

  • greybox.formula - Formula parsing function

  • greybox.expand_formula - Formula expansion function

  • greybox.bc_transform - Box-Cox transformation

  • greybox.bc_transform_inv - Inverse Box-Cox transformation

  • greybox.mean_fast - Trimmed/hubered mean

Model Selection

  • greybox.stepwise() - Stepwise IC-based variable selection

  • greybox.CALM() - Combine ALM models based on IC weights

Accuracy Measures

  • greybox.measures.MAE() - Mean Absolute Error

  • greybox.measures.MSE() - Mean Squared Error

  • greybox.measures.RMSE() - Root Mean Squared Error

  • greybox.measures.MAPE() - Mean Absolute Percentage Error

  • greybox.measures.MASE() - Mean Absolute Scaled Error

Variable Processing

  • greybox.xreg.xreg_expander() - Lag/lead expansion

  • greybox.xreg.xreg_multiplier() - Cross-product generation

  • greybox.xreg.temporal_dummy() - Temporal dummy variables
